University of Texas Rio Grande Valley (all campuses)
comments: She is very considerate and helpful. Willing to explain things in great detail. She has a good sense of humor and that also makes this course bearable.I would definitely recommend her.

school_name: University of Texas Rio Grande Valley (all campuses)
comments: I really like her teaching style and real world examples she gives. I was having difficulties to understand some of the materials and she was very helpful during her office hours. You should take her class because even though the material is boring, she is fun:-)I like her accent too,it is very cute!

school_name: University of Texas Rio Grande Valley (all campuses)
comments: Well she is not a bad professor but sometimes it is not very clear what she wants as homework. Very strict at times.She gives hints about the exams. I guess doing the homework is the key to be successful in this class. She does not take attendance which I think is wonderful!but she makes it very clear that if you dont attend,it is your responsibili

school_name: University of Texas Rio Grande Valley (all campuses)
comments: She always gives relevant examples and makes it easy to understand complicated materials. Makes jokes and keeps the attention high at all times. Great professor!
